alert.note: Alert for Le Flore (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 26 at 8:39AM CDT until March 27 at 4:38AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Poteau River near Panama affecting Le Flore County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Poteau River near Panama. * WHEN...Until late tonight. * IMPACTS...At 33.0 feet, moderate flooding of agricultural lands occurs between Shady Point and Arkoma. Williams Road east of Panama and some local farm roads are flooded. At 35.0 feet, moderate flooding of agricultural lands occur from Panama to Arkoma. Some local and county roads in the floodplain become impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 AM CDT Sunday the stage was 35.4 feet. - Forecast...The river crested yesterday afternoon at 37.93 feet and is falling. The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this evening and continue falling and remain below flood stage. - Flood stage is 29.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
